entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as being quiet and trying to keep Sirius alive.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who was locked up by Dumbledore last summer. Harry is trying to get him out.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story. He is furious with Dumbledore for locking him up and wants to rage at him.

relationships.description: Dumbledore was trying to keep Sirius alive, as mentioned in the conversation between Harry and Dumbledore.
Harry is angry at Dumbledore for locking him up last summer.
